page.title: 16OBSERVATIONS ON LIFESTYLES
page.content: The{POPULATION}falls into two fairly distinct groups-the village oriented, and the RAF families. Generally, the{POPULATION}is stable} and a high proportion have lived here for more than ten years.Most people say they enjoy the slower pace of life. A very wide range of {LEISURE {ACTIVITIES}are pursued. Gardening is by far the most popular ,except_ amongst RAF families who prefer sporting pastimes. Cats and dogs are the most popular of a long list of {PETS}kept; RAF families are particular dog lovers. Local people patronize local shops frequently and these are thriving.RAF families prefer the larger stores in Shrewsbury. Most people go to{CHURCH}infrequently or not at all. The RAF provides most{WORK otherwise people tend to work locally, rarely travelling beyond Telford.
